title: NTPC arms commission 50 MW solar project in MP, 98.78 MW in Rajasthan
description: NTPC announced the commissioning of a 50 MW capacity from the 220 MW Shajapur Solar Project in Madhya Pradesh and 98.78 MW from the 300 MW Shambu ki Burj-2 Solar PV Project in Bikaner, Rajasthan.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
